goal.tools.mc.program.goal

Class GOALMentalStateConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • goal.tools.mc.program.goal.GOALMentalStateConverter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GOALMentalStateConverter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents a mental state converter. The task of instances of this class is to translate a MentalState object to the binary representation, and back. Each instance has a single MentalState object associated with it, whose contents often changes.

    Serialization

    The serialization is currently made to support loading a previously learned behaviour (see FileLearner) for execution of a GOAL program. A de-serialized GOALMentalStateConverter is partial: Module and GoalBase are not restored fully. Also, we don't save all info stored here that is relevant for learning. Therefore, a de-serialized GOALMentalStateConverter can not be used to resume model checking or resume learning.

    Author:
    sungshik, W.Pasman added serialization #2246
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
